original_title: Letters Live from the Archive: International Women’s Day
overview: Celebrate International Women’s Day with this brand new inspiring film from LETTERS LIVE. In “LETTERS LIVE from the Archive: International Women’s Day”, remarkable letters are read by a diverse array of outstanding luminaries, including stunning performances from Olivia Colman, Gillian Anderson, Daisy Ridley, Caitlin Moran, Rose McGowan, Adwoa Aboah, Louise Brealey and more. Plus music from Roxanne Tataei.
tagline: LETTERS LIVE celebrates letter writing and the art of correspondence through live events where remarkable letters are read by a diverse array of outstanding performers.
title: Letters Live from the Archive: International Women’s Day
